entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then clearing. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
